
Run neutral Wright-Fisher with mutation
```{r}
num_generations <- 1000
pop_size <- 250
mu <- 0.004
selection <- 0
aDF <- Models$WrightFisherRun(as.integer(num_generations), as.integer(pop_size), mu, selection, as.integer(pop_size))
```
